data.name: Naga
data.description:
Naga

Units:
+2 armor
+30% buy cooldown

Buildings:
+2 armor
-10% hit points

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Armor

Magic:
Abolish Magic (dispels buffs from 1 unit)
Silence (silences for 15 sec in 175 AoE)
Mana Burn (burns 250 mana to 1 unit)

Traits: Strong units that are proficient both in ancient arcane arts and physical combat. Specializes in magic neutralization. No foothold in surface world means weak base defence and low unit supplies.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Brilliance Aura
auras.description:
+0.1 MP/s to units and buildings
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Mana Leak Aura
auras.description:
-4 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Frost Aura
auras.description:
-15% unit attack and move speed
(does not affect Special unit)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Lost Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Lost Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 3 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

Type: Anti Hero

spells.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

+20% damage reduction

spells.name: Chain Lightning - [Level 4]
spells.description: Calls forth a bolt of lightning that bounces up to 13 times, dealing <AOcl,DataA4> damage on the primary target. Each jump deals less damage.

towerUpgrades.name: Overpower
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and 1.5 sec stun
Affects: Myrmidon
(has 0.5 sec duration on Heroes)

Lv1: +6 damage, 10% stun chance
Lv2: +12 damage, 20% stun chance
Lv3: +18 damage, 30% stun chance
Lv4: +24 damage, 40% stun chance

towerUpgrades.name: Hardened Scales
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage block
Affects: Siren, Sea Witch, Gorgon and Myrmidon

Lv1: 10% to block 25 damage
Lv2: 20% to block 30 damage
Lv3: 30% to block 35 damage
Lv4: 40% to block 40 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Strong Acid
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and move slow
Affects: Couatl and Tidal Guardian

Lv1: 8 damage/sec, 25% slow for 12 sec
Lv2: 16 damage/sec, 30% slow for 12 sec
Lv3: 24 damage/sec, 35% slow for 12 sec
Lv4: 32 damage/sec, 40% slow for 12 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Frost Arrows
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: slows targeted unit
Affects: Sea Witch and Harpoon
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 10% slow for 10 sec
Lv2: 20% slow for 10 sec
Lv3: 30% slow for 10 sec
Lv4: 40% slow for 10 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Highborne Blood
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: spell resistance and regeneration
Affects: Siren, Sea Witch, Gorgon and Myrmidon

Lv1: -5% spell damage and +3 HP/s
Lv2: -10% spell damage and +6 HP/s
Lv3: -15% spell damage and +9 HP/s
Lv4: -20% spell damage and +12 HP/s

towerUpgrades.name: Frenzy
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: attack rate after a kill
Affects: Siren and Sea Witch

Lv1: +100% attack rate for 3 sec
Lv2: +150% attack rate for 4 sec
Lv3: +200% attack rate for 5 sec
Lv4: +250% attack rate for 6 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Corrosive Spit
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: acid bomb in 200 AoE
Affects: Couatl

Lv1: -2 armor, 8 damage/sec for 15 sec
Lv2: -4 armor, 16 damage/sec for 15 sec
Lv3: -6 armor, 24 damage/sec for 15 sec
Lv4: -8 armor, 32 damage/sec for 15 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Siren's Song
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: ability to disable units
Affects: Siren
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: disables for 3 sec
Lv2: disables for 6 sec
Lv3: disables for 9 sec
Lv4: disables for 12 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Triple Blades
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance for bonus damage
Affects: Sea Witch and Harpoon

Lv1: 10% to do 3x damage
Lv2: 20% to do 3x damage
Lv3: 30% to do 3x damage
Lv4: 40% to do 3x damage

t1spell.name: Eruption [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 300 damage in 170 AoE.
Stuns for 8 seconds.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Great Tide [X]
t2spell.description:
Sends tidal waves in all directions.
Each wave deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

fort.name: Shrine of Azshara (Lv1)
fort.description:
Units:
+2 armor
+30% buy cooldown

Buildings:
+1 armor
-10% hit points

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Armor

Traits: Strong race, proficient in ancient arcane arts and magic neutralization. Yet it struggles to establish foothold on surface world. Unit supply is limited and buildings lack solid foundations.

Difficulty: Skilled

skills.description:

Stuns for 8 seconds.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

skills.name: Great Tide [X]

Each wave deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

175-325 damage, 2.5-4 sec stun

225-375 damage
(450-600 area of effect)

skills.name: Tidal Burst - [Level 1]
skills.description: Deals 175 damage to nearby enemy land units and stuns them for 2.5 seconds.

skills.name: Frost Armor - [Level 1]
skills.description: Creates a shield of frost around self. Adds 1 armor.

heroes.name: Demon Lord
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee/Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Null Field (Disable Spell)
silences for 20-32 sec
(doesn't affect Special unit)

10-22 damage/sec

(doesn't affect buildings)

summons 2 Demons for 30-60 sec
